title: Blizzard Universe Grand Collection
description:
A Grand Collection of Games, Books, Comics, Cinematics, Documentaries and Soundtracks. It includes a luancher, screenshots, music, poster, mods, maps, and much much more. Also, custom made covers for all the disks, if you want to keep them nice in a shelf.

Because of the huge size you can either download the whole collection or the disks individually.

Disk 1 - Games
Warcraft: Orcs and Humans
Warcraft II: Battle.net edition (with working Windows 10 crack created by me.)
Warcraft III: BattleChest
Warcraft Adventures Lord of the Clans Long Play video.
Starcraft: Battle.net Edition
Starcraft Ghost Gameplay video and Cinematic.
Diablo Gold (with working Windows 10 crack created by me.)
Diablo II: Battle.net Edition
The Lost Vikings
The Lost Vikings 2
Blackthorne
Rock 'n Roll Racing

+ Mods and Maps, Manuals and Hi-Resolution Posters.

Disk 2 - Starcraft 2 Gold Edition part 1

Disk 3 - Starcraft 2 Gold Edition part 2
Note: Starcraft 2 Legacy of the Void is planed as an update to this collection
Disk 4 - Books, Comics and Soundtracks

Soundtracks from ALL Blizard Games in .flac quality.
